name: 13.8" Bladeless Desk Fan - 6 Speed Modes, Small Bladelss rechargeable fan with 6000mAh Battery, Quite Office fan, Easy to Clean & Touch Control, Desk Fan Small Quite for Office, Bedroom
short_description: 【Small Bladeless Desk Fan】Experience the future of personal cooling with our compact desk fan, featuring a revolutionary bladeless design that combines cutting-edge turbine technology with sleek aesthetics. Safe for all ages and pets, you can enjoy a worry-free environment, free from the risk of finger injuries. Plus, the easy-to-clean surface saves you time and effort.

【Touch Control & 6 Speeds Adjustable】Enjoy a breeze that's tailored to your preference with our fan's touch-controlled interface. With 6 customizable airflow settings, you can effortlessly switch between speeds for optimal comfort. We recommend using the original charger and USB cable for the best performance and user experience.

【Portable Fan Rechargeable】Our compact table fan is designed with portability in mind. Its lightweight and space-efficient design makes it the perfect addition to any workspace or living area. Whether you're in the office, bedroom, or on the go, this quiet desk fan won't take up valuable space.

【Small Quiet Desk Fan】 This table fan is the epitome of compact design, lightweight and unobtrusive, ensuring it fits seamlessly into any space. Its portability means you can take your personal breeze anywhere, anytime. What sets this personal fan apart is its whisper-quiet performance, eliminating the distraction of noise typically associated with traditional fans. Whether you're seeking a fan for the bedroom, office, desk, or dorm.

【Customer Satisfaction is Our Priority】At Relexnow, we're committed to delivering stylish, high-quality fans that meet your expectations. Our priority is your satisfaction, and we're here to support you with any inquiries. Reach out to us anytime, and we promise a prompt, satisfactory resolution within 24 hours.

name: Bladeless Heater and Fan Combo, 1400 Watt Heater Fan and 40 Watt Cold Fan, 80° Oscillating Fan, All the Season Use, Remote and Touch Control, Floor Tower fan, Office Room, Bedroom, Blue White
short_description: 【Bladeless Fan Technology】: This bladeless tower fan can provide fresh air without rotating the blades, the leafless design will not hurt your baby and pet, it is an ideal summer/winter must-have for families with children and pets. Easy to clean, just wipe the surface with a rag. This bladeless tower fan with space heater will accompany you the whole cool summer and cold winter
【Heater and Fan combo】1400 W heating and 40 W cooling fan produces both strong cold wind and quick warm wind flow making sure you enjoy a more comfortable room all the season.

【Fast Heating and Instant Warmth】: Powerful 1400 watt Brushless DC motor heating element allows this space heaters for indoor use quickly heat up to 70°F in 3 seconds, 80°widespread oscillation portable heater rotates from side to side to generates more effective, immediate and evenly warmth for your surroundings, guards your family's warmth and happiness in winter. There are 3 modes of our heated fan, including low, high heating settings and fan only

【Quiet and Evenly Breeze】: This powerful yet silent floor fan is expertly engineered to produce little noise(only 25-40dB) that won’t disturb your sleep; built-in timer can be set from 1 to 9 hours for a good night’s sleep or nap during nights. The LED will automatically turn off after 30 seconds

【Multiple safety protection】: Auto-shut-off safety system includes tip-over, over- current and overheat protection. Overheat system will shut the heater off when the parts of the heater over heat, this indoor bladeless space heater also will shut off once it is tipped over to help prevent accidents(when in heater mode)

【Easy Operation】: This bladeless tower fan with space heater is transported as a whole machine and can be used immediately without your assembly. In order to ensure safe transportation, we use very strong packaging materials.We also provide 24-hour online service, so you can buy with confidence

name: Dyson Hot+Cool™ AM09 Jet Focus heater and fan
short_description: Air Multiplier technology amplifies the surrounding air, giving an uninterrupted stream of smooth airflow.
Our ceramic plates heat up fast to heat you quickly in cold weather.¹
Powerful, amplified airflow cools you fast in hot weather.
Temperature range: 32-98.6°F.
Jet Focus control allows you to choose between Focused and Diffused modes for personal or whole-room heating.¹ And direct cooling or a gentle breeze in hot weather.
The Sleep timer can be programmed to turn off after pre-set intervals, from 15 minutes to 9 hours.
The Remote control is curved and magnetized to store neatly on your Dyson Hot+Cool Jet Focus fan heater.
Smooth oscillation directs airflow around the room. Oscillates at a 70 ° angle​.

name: OceanLoong 1500W Bladeless Tower Fan & Space Heater Combo for Home with Remote Control Timer Oscillation Tip-Over Switch and Adjustable Thermostat, 29” AB01H (Black)
short_description: Bladeless Fan and Space Heater Combo - AB01H is a very good electric space heater for 300 sq.ft. bedroom, home and office. And it is also a bladeless fan that can bring natural airflow. In the heater mode, the fan speeds cannot be changed. But you can set the temperature from 60 to 99 ℉ to meet your needs. The heater will always release the heating until the room temp. reaches the setting temp. You can use it to enjoy the comfortable air all-year around.

Adjustable Thermostat, Energy Efficient - The Space Heater mode features adjustable thermostat. That benefit you to set and balance the room temperature from 60℉ to 99℉. It built-in variable frequency Eco ceramic heating functions, which maintains room temperature while using less energy. Very Energy Efficient. In heating mode, press and hold the heating button on the remote control for 5 seconds to switch the displayed temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit .

Advanced Safety Features - Safety is a top priority with the AB01H. It includes a tip-over switch, overheat protection, and efficient heat dissipation to ensure safe operation, even during extended use. The self-regulating ceramic heating element keeps the exterior cool to the touch, except for the hot air outlet and plug. This design ensures that all other external parts of the fan remain safe to touch, providing peace of mind for you and your family.

Multiple Convenient Functions - The AB01H is designed for maximum convenience and versatility. It features 120° oscillation, 260° tilt head, 9 fan speeds, and 9-hour timer, ensuring wide coverage of hot or natural airflow for your home, office, or bedroom. The dual control options—LED touch screen and remote control—make it incredibly user-friendly and easy to operate.

Auto-Off and Timer Function - The AB01H allows you to program the fan or heater to automatically turn off after 1 to 9 hours, providing flexibility and energy savings. The LED display automatically turns off after 1 minute of inactivity (press any button to wake it up). Additionally, the heater mode operates quietly, making it ideal for use while sleeping without disturbing your rest.

Complete Accessories - When you purchase the AB01H, you’ll receive everything you need to get started: 1 x Fan Body 1 x Fan Base 1 x User Manual 1 x Remote Control (including 2 x LR03 AAA alkaline battery)
Important Notes !!! Please watch the AB01 base installation video before assembling your fan. Correct installation prevents damage to the rotation mechanism.

name: Lasko 1500 Watt 4 Speed Quiet Bladeless Multi Function Remote Control Comfort Control Tower Fan and Space Heater with 3 Heat Settings, White
short_description: Portable: Features a high-reaching bladeless tower fan design for maximum air delivery with a small footprint, so it won’t take up much space

Multiple Speeds: Quiet fan speeds of 4 (high, medium, low, and super low), 3 heat settings (high, medium, and low), plus one heater/fan combination mode which simultaneously activates high heat and super low fan
Electronic Thermostat: AutoEco automatic electronic thermostat of bladeless fan allows you to heat the room you’re in and maintain comfort using less energy
Included Remote: Cooling fan has multi-function digital remote control with on-board storage allows you to operate the fan and heater functions, as well as oscillation, timer, and power
Built-In Safety Features: Tower fan features ceramic element, overheat protection, cool-touch housing, tip-over safety switch; Dimensions are (L x W x H): 12.5 x 12.5 x 41.8 inches
product_description: The Lasko FH500 is an innovative hybrid tower that is both fan AND heater. It’s designed to provide year round home comfort and can be used in the bedroom, living room, basement, kitchen, garage, home office, dorm or anywhere else in the house relief is needed. Powered by a 3-speed 1500 watt ceramic heater and 4 quiet fan speeds, this dual purpose product not only heats up a room fast to keep you warm & toasty on cold winter days & nights, but also creates excellent air circulation to help you beat the heat when it’s hot & humid outdoors. The unit is ETL Listed and comes with built-in Tip-Over Safety Switch and Overheat Protection safety features to take the worry out of using the heater for long periods of time. The self-contained, self-regulating ceramic heating element helps keep the exterior cool to the touch making the FH500 a safe choice for chilly days and nights. It is easy use and the simple base assembly requires no tools. Tower stands 42” tall with a small 13” x 13” footprint and is ideal for apartments with limited storage. Because it’s 2 units in 1, you can use the stand fan/heater year round without sacrificing space, air circulation, comfort or style. Perfectly sized to aim over a high bed to circulate the air so you can get some rest. Powerful enough to blow across the room and yet creates just the right amount of white noise at bedside for sleeping. The easy to clean filter keeps the unit running efficiently. Lightweight and portable. Comes with built-in carry handle, optional oscillation, and energy efficient adjustable digital thermostat and 8-hr programmable timer features. The remote is the best when you don’t feel like getting up to change the settings.Widespread oscillation

name: Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool™ Gen1 HP10 - Purifying Fan Heater (White)
short_description: Air Multiplier technology circulates purified air throughout the whole room.¹
All year-round purifier. Heats in the winter, cools you in the summer.
Curved and magnetized remote control stores neatly on the machine. Not app compatible.
Oscillates up to 350°
Programmed to turn off after pre-set intervals of 1, 2, 4 and 8 hours
Fully sealed to HEPA Standard. So what goes inside, stays inside.²
Night mode monitors and purifies using the quietest settings, with a dimmed display.

name: PYY Heater and Fan Combo - Bladeless Tower Fan and Heater Combo with Filter, w/ 8 Speeds, Heater Temp Control, 90° Oscillating, 9H Timer, Quiet Heater Fan Combo for Indoor Use
short_description: SAFE NO-BLADE DESIGN: Our tower fan and heater combo features a safe, no-blade design, offering peace of mind for homes with children or pets. This fan heater combo for indoor use is easy to clean, saving you time and effort. Designed for year-round comfort, it helps provide cooling in the summer and cozy warmth in the winter. The concealed blade design ensures safety and a more comfortable experience for your loved ones.

HIGH-EFFICIENCY FILTRATION & EASY CONTROL: Equipped with an advanced filtration system, this standing tower heater and fan combo helps reduce common indoor pollutants such as smoke, pollen, and pet dander, improving air quality for a fresher environment. It allows you to adjust settings like timer, oscillation, fan speed, and temperature effortlessly on the couch or bed, ensuring both comfort and convenience.

CUSTOMIZABLE SETTINGS FOR ANY SITUATION: With 8 fan speeds in cooling mode and 3 heating levels, this heater and fan combo offers adjustable comfort to match any occasion. The wide-angle oscillation ensures balanced air circulation throughout your space. Whether it’s a gentle breeze or strong airflow you need, this heater and cooler combo adapts to your preferences, making it ideal for all seasons.

ENHANCED SAFETY FEATURES: Prioritizing your safety, this fan and heater combo includes features like tip-over and overheat protection, providing a safer indoor environment. Its lightweight and compact design make it easy to move and store, offering a reliable heating and cooling solution for any space.

ONE-YEAR WARRANTY AND SUPPORT: Dimensions: 26"*6". We offer a one-year warranty and dedicated customer support to address any questions or concerns. Our team is here to ensure you have a seamless and satisfying experience with your heater and cooler combo.

name: Dreo Tower Fan and Heater Combo, 29.2ft/s Standing Fans for Bedroom, 17 Levels, 6 Modes, 120° Oscillation, 42 Inch, 12H Timer, 25dB Quiet, with Remote, for Office, Large Room, Silver
short_description: The Ultimate Fan & Heater: the DREO MC706 integrates an auto-shift tech that lets you go from a 5-level 1500W PTC room heater in winter to 12 cooling fan speeds in summer, making this 42 inch 2-in-1 heater fan for bedroom a great option for all-season use

Wind Speeds Faster Than Ever: The 1800 RPM upgraded DC motor delivers an extra boost in performance, blowing 1585 CFM of air volume up to 40 ft away, together with Dreo fan's ultrawide 120˚ oscillation, you can bring cool wind and warmth wherever you need

Go Large on Heating Power and Savings: Powered by Hyperamics larger PTC element, this heater for indoor use delivers instant 2s heat and lets you set up room temperature anywhere from 41-95˚F with ±1.5˚F precision thanks to DREO's advanced ECO mode

8-layer Protection: This heater for indoor use packs 8 safety features for ultimate peace of mind, including our patented FortPlug, V-0 flame retardant built, overheat and tip-over protection, thermal insulated wiring, cool touch housing and child lock, all certified by ETL

Choose Quietness, Choose DREO: Powered by TurboSilent aerodynamic design, this fan for bedroom brings warm air at an unhearable 25dB, making this tower fan ideal for spaces that need warmth and silence like offices or for a good night sleep at home

Easy to Control, More to Enjoy: Automate your comfort with 12h timers warm up your room before hand or to fall-sleep worry free. You can also easily control this heater fan combo from its top control panel or from far away thanks to its included remote control
We Are Always Here for You: Let our product experts guide you through any issues or questions you might have with the product at any time with our customer support line

name: Shark TurboBlade Fan—Ultra-customizable bladeless tower fan, pivots, twists, oscillates 180°, circulates and propels air up to 80 ft., 10 noise levels + 10 speeds, easy to clean, charcoal, TF202S
short_description: Shark TurboBlade tower fan pivots to cool every corner for ultra-powerful, quiet cooling anywhere inside your home. Pivot fan vertically and horizontally, twist vents for multi-room coverage, and get up to 80 feet of power with 180° of oscillation.
Powerful Airflow: Bladeless technology pulls in surrounding air and propels a powerful breeze up to 80 feet that circulates throughout your room.
Limitless Customization: Pivot fan from focused vertical Tower Mode to horizontal widespread Air Blanket Mode, twist vents in multiple directions, oscillate up to 180°, and adjust height.
10 Speeds, 10 Noise Levels: Choose between 10 speeds for all sleep and relaxation modes — from quiet, gentle cooling to powerful white noise.
2X More Cooling Coverage: Dual blades, twistable vents, and 180° oscillation unlock vast cooling coverage across your home.
True Bladeless Cooling: Wipe-clean bladeless design and Dust Defense to capture particles make TurboBlade extremely easy to clean and optimizes power for years to come.
Whats included: TurboBlade Fan, Remote Control
product_description: The Shark Turboblade - the powerful bladeless fan, accelerating air over 80 feet with 180° oscillation across your home. It’s endlessly customizable — pivot from vertical to horizontal cooling, twist the vents in two directions, oscillate, & more. Its bladeless design and DustDefense technology make for easy cleaning. Choose your chill with a blade of air that pivots to cool every corner.

name: EZ-CHILL 40" Bladeless Tower Fan for Bedroom with Remote Control, 9H Timer, Wide Area Oscillation, Push Button Digital Display, 3 Speed Home Floor Fan, White/Silver
short_description: This 40" bladeless tower fan features a touch screen, remote control, LED digital display, 9-hour timer, and a quiet operation mode, making it perfect for home use. With three adjustable speeds, it offers versatility for different settings. You can conveniently control the airspeed from anywhere in the room and set the auto shut-off timer for added comfort.

This bladeless tower fan requires no assembly and boasts a sleek, compact design that complements a wide range of home decor styles. Weighing under 10 lbs, its arch-shaped structure makes it easy to carry and move between rooms, so you can enjoy its cooling benefits wherever you go. With its all-in-one design, this standing fan eliminates the need for complicated setup, saving you time and effort.

Designed with safety and efficiency in mind, this bladeless tower fan delivers smooth, even airflow without the risk of injury. The EZ-CHILL bladeless tower fan is an ideal summer essential for homes with children and pets, offering both cooling comfort and protection.

This oscillating bladeless tower fan features a wide area oscillating design that efficiently distributes ample airflow, sending airflow into the room faster. The powerful turbocharged air delivery system provides a constant, fresh breeze to keep everyone in the room comfortable on hot days.

Before cleaning the fan, ensure the power cord is disconnected from the plug. Wipe the grille surface with a clean, damp cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners. DO NOT IMMERSE THE FAN OR ANY WIRES IN WATER. Reattach the front grille before using the fan. Allow the fan to dry completely before turning it on. Regularly cleaning the grille with a vacuum will help prevent dust buildup. The motor is sealed and does not require any internal maintenance, cleaning, or lubrication.
